programme.title: Misbehaviour
programme.desc: Brittisk dramakomedi från 2020. Året är 1970 och den ambitiösa medelklasstjejen Sally har insett att attityden hos män i hennes omgivning sätter käppar i hjulet för karriären. När hon lär känna den rebelliska Jo upptäcker hon att det finns mängder av tjejer som är redo att sätta hårt mot hårt för stoppa den föråldrade kvinnosyn som råder. Tillsammans med sina medsystrar tänker de genomföra en högljudd protest mitt under Miss World-uttagningen som direktsänds till över 100 miljoner TV-tittare. Medverkande: Kajsa Mohammar, Lily Newmark, Greg Kinnear,.

programme.title: 21 Jump Street
programme.desc: Amerikansk actionkomedi från 2012. På grund av deras ungdomliga utseende får poliserna Schmidt och Jenko i uppdrag att jobba under täckmantel på en gymnasieskola. Målet är att sätta stopp för några knarklangare som säljer en ny farlig drog. Trots att det inte är länge sedan de själva gick i gymnasiet inser Schmidt och Jenko att mycket har förändrats.

programme.title: Trolls 2: Världsturnén
programme.desc: Amerikansk animerad familjefilm från 2020. Poppy och Kvist upptäcker att deras rike bara är en av sex musikaliska världar: funk, country, techno, klassiskt, pop och rock. Sex världar som tidigare varit förenade i perfekt harmoni.

programme.title: Barbie & hennes systrar i ett hästäventyr
programme.desc: Amerikansk animerad barnfilm från 2013. Barbie och hennes systrar tar sig ut på sitt livs äventyr på en ridakademi i Alperna, där Barbie hittar hästen hon alltid har drömt om.

programme.title: Spark
programme.desc: Amerikanskt animerat äventyr från 2016. Den idylliska planeten Bana står under hot av den maktgalna schimpansen och generalen Zhong. Han styr med en järnhand. Tretton år senare leder den beslutsamma apan Spark en modig grupp som består av den tuffa och beredda räven Vix och den tekniskt kunniga mekanikern och grisen Chunk. Tillsammans försöker de kullkasta general Zhongs planer om att släppa lös monstret Kraken som kan skapa svarta hål. Lyckas de rädda Bana och galaxen från total förstörelse?

programme.title: Svanprinsessan 4
programme.desc: Amerikansk animerad film från 2012. Prinsessan Odetta och Prins Derek firar sin första jul tillsammans när de plötsligt står öga mot öga mot en gammal fiende. Rothbart, en ond trollkarl, som planerar att förstöra julen.

programme.title: Stuart Little
programme.desc: Amerikansk familjefilm från 1999. Familjen Little adopterar en söt liten pojke vid namn Stuart som ser ut precis som en liten mus. Deras andra son är inte säker på vad han ska tro och tycka och familjens katt lägger upp en plan för att bli av med Stuart för gott. Filmen visas dubbad.

programme.title: Boog & Elliot - vilda vänner
programme.desc: Amerikansk animerad komedi från 2006. Boog är en tam, bekymmerslös grizzlybjörn som lever hos en skogsväktare. När han möter Elliot, en tanig, energisk hjort, vänds hans liv upp och ner. Med några få dagar kvar till jaktsäsongen blir de två strandsatta i skogen och måste med hjälp av de andra djuren skrämma iväg jägarna.

programme.title: Boog & Elliot 2 - Vilda vänner mot husdjuren
programme.desc: Amerikanskt animerat äventyr från 2008. Elliot blir kär i Giselle. Men att gifta sig med henne visar sig svårare än han kunnat ana. Särskilt efter att Weenie kidnappats av ett gäng som vill ge tillbaka honom till hans rättmätiga ägare. Det är den datoranimerade uppföljaren till Boog & Elliott  Vilda vänner.

programme.title: Trolls 2: Världsturnén

programme.title: The farewell
programme.desc: Amerikanskt dramakomedi från 2019. Billi reser till Changchun för ett familjebröllop. Bröllopet är bara en ursäkt för hela familjen att samlas för att träffa mormor, som inte har länge att leva, något som hon inte vet.

programme.title: Möhippan
programme.desc: Amerikansk romantisk komedi från 2012. Tre vänner ombeds att vara brudtärnor vid ett bröllop för en kompis som de brukade driva med när de gick i skolan. Natten innan bröllopet blir utekvällen lite mer händelserik än de räknat med.

programme.title: Croodarna
programme.desc: Amerikansk animerad familjefilm från 2013. Croodarnas grotta förstörs. De ger sig ut för att utforska ett spektakulärt landskap fyllt med fantastiska varelser, märkliga överraskningar och en helt ny värld av äventyr.

programme.title: Stuart Little

programme.title: Svanprinsessan: En kunglig familjesaga
programme.desc: Amerikansk animerad film från 2014. Prins Derek och prinsessa Odette måste rädda den lilla flickan Alise, som har blivit kidnappad av ett gäng flygande ekorrar.

programme.title: Boog & Elliot 3: Cirkusvänner
programme.desc: Amerikansk animerad komedi från 2010. Boogs vänner väljer annat framför den årliga grabbresan. En besviken Boog bestämmer sig för att göra en egen resa, som leder honom till en cirkus. Boogs byter plats med en björnimitatör och faller för en intagande rysk truppmedlem. Sedan inser han att man kanske inte måste välja mellan familj och vänskap, trots allt.

programme.title: Boog & Elliot 4 - jaktsäsong
programme.desc: Amerikansk animerad barnfilm från 2015. I skogsreservatet Timberline berättar Elliot en skräckinjagande historia för sina vänner om en varulv som bor i skogen. Boog tar hans berättelse på orden och bestämmer sig för att inte följa med på sommarens årliga campingresa. Djuren samarbetar för att hjälpa honom att ta reda på sanningen om mysteriet med den ylande varulven och övervinna sin överväldigande rädsla.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team investigates a deadly explosion at the Navy-Marine Corps Relief Gala event they were attending. They discover that Pride was the intended target of the bomb.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: When a navy Admiral's daughter is the prime suspect in double murders aboard a research boat, the team partners with the Coast Guard Investigative Service to work the case. Meanwhile, Lasalle tracks down his estranged brother.Guests: Diane Neal..

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The sisters are assigned a new whitelighter; Phoebe and Leslie confess their feelings.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Agent Brody convinces Paige to help him solve a mysterious string of accidents.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Paige and Agent Brody become part of a novel written by two students from the school.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Leo uses his new powers to reverse time so he can save himself and vanquish the demons.Guests: Patrice Fisher, Joel Swetow, Brad Hawkins, Kevin Alejandro..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: A navy lieutenant commander in impeccable shape turns to Pride and the team to solve his imminent murder after discovering he has been poisoned with a lethal dose of radiation.Guests: Diane Neal..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After an NCIS agent is killed during security detail for the Vice Chief of Naval Operations, the team must determine if this was assassination or if someone is targeting one of their own. Meanwhile, Agent Brody is placed under investigation.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After a Petty Officer is found murdered in the midst of Mardi Gras events, the team investigates what parades and parties led to his untimely death. Also, Pride must decide what aspects of his strained relationship with his father he is willing to share.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After a Navy recruiter is the target of a lethal hit and run, the team investigates whether the murder was tied to her career or her role as a foster mother to two brothers. Also, Lasalle grows increasingly concerned for his brother's welfare.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Pride is adamant the elusive 'Baitfish' has returned and, in an attempt to locate his nemesis, he has the team investigate crime scenes and chase leads from New Orleans to Charleston, South Carolina.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Everyone is a suspect when a body is found murdered at a popular nightclub known as 'The Lab.' In an unusual twist of storytelling, Brennan, Booth and the Jeffersonian team take on various roles serving as the nightclub staff.Guests: Motley Crue, Ryan O'Neal, Brendan Fehr, Eric Millegan..

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Booth has been recovering from brain surgery while Brennan has been on a dig in Guatemala. During a tarot card reading, Angela's psychic reveals that there are bodies buried under a fountain in Washington, D.C.Guests: Cyndi Lauper..

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan
programme.desc: Many years after Tarzan left the jungles of Africa to live in London with his wife Jane, he is invited back as a trade emissary to the Congo. He is unaware that he is just a pawn in a deadly convergence of greed, putting both his lives in danger.

programme.title: Godzilla: King of the Monsters
programme.desc: The agency Monarch battles the monsters known as Titans.

programme.title: All Elite Wrestling: Rampage
programme.desc: The World Championship Eliminator Tournament begins with Orange Cassidy facing Powerhouse Hobbs. Women's champion Dr. Britt Baker, DMD, wrestled Dark Order star Anna Jay. In a rematch, Andrade el Idolo faces PAC.

programme.title: Rhodes to the Top
programme.desc: Cody and Brandi Rhodes navigate their growing family while building AEW's global empire.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After a sailor is murdered in the champagne room of a strip club, the team links the murder weapon to two additional unsolved cases. Also, Brody's ex-fiancé pays her a surprise visit.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: While conducting an autopsy on a petty officer who is believed to have died from natural causes, an armed man enters the morgue and holds Wade, Sebastian and Danny hostage.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: When a navy commander's car is stolen with his baby inside, the team must determine if this was a random carjacking or a targeted abduction.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: With no memory of the night before, Lasalle's brother, Cade, turns to NCIS for help when he finds his girlfriend's body in the trunk of his car.Guests: Dylan Walsh..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.sub-title: How Much Pain Can You Take?
programme.desc: To send a message to Pride, Baitfish murders someone close to the NCIS team, prompting a citywide manhunt for the elusive criminal.Guests: Dylan Walsh..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After receiving intelligence that the ports have been breached, placing the navy and Gulf Coast in harm's way, Pride and the team follow every angle to determine what has entered their city and how they can put a stop to the Broussard Syndicate.Guests: Dylan Walsh..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After a military convoy is bombed on a New Orleans bridge, Pride and the team plan a dangerous undercover operation to retrieve a stolen missile and prevent an attack on a U.S. Naval ship.Guests: Dr. John..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a blogger dedicated to exposing government corruption and cover-ups and discovers a Navy SEAL and CIA humanitarian mission with a dark secret.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: When a female combat pilot and navy hero dies in an air-show plane crash, the team must investigate if it's the fault of the pilot or the new jet that was just approved to deploy to bases globally.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team must determine why a murdered navy drone pilot was using a black market drone to obtain military surveillance and whether the drone's footage is linked to his death.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Special Agent Pride is sent a partner from the Australian Defence Force Investigation Service, Special Agent Naomi Parsons, after an Australian Royal Navy lieutenant, who was key to international negotiations on nuclear weapons, is murdered.Guests: Kate Beahan..

programme.desc: Rose's younger sister Holly comes to visit and charms Dorothy, Blanche and Sophia.Guests: Inga Swenson..

programme.desc: Sophia kidnaps her friend after she is moved into a minimum standards nursing home.Guests: Ellen Albertini Dow..

programme.desc: The housemates decide that it is time to diet seriously.Guests: Hilary Shepard..

programme.desc: Sophia's friends arrive from Sicily, claiming that their real bambina is Dorothy.Guests: Vito Scotti..

programme.desc: A for sale sign was accidentally placed on the front lawn. But, Blanche begins to consider actually selling after seeing how much she's offered.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche debates on whether or not to sell the house as she and the rest of the girls recall times they have spent together.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy is suffering from a mysterious fatigue syndrome that her doctors cannot identify.Guests: Michael McGuire..

programme.desc: Dorothy finds a specialist, a Chinese virologist, who may have the key to her illness.Guests: Keone Young..

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche's daughter, Rebecca, has some wonderful news. She's going to become a mother through artificial insemination. However, Blanche is less than thrilled and totally against the entire idea.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: When the company that Rose's husband worked for, cuts off their pension plan, Rose must face the fact that she's going to get a new job, one that pays more.Guests: Chick Vennera..

programme.title: The Golden Girls

programme.title: The Golden Girls

programme.desc: Sophia's friend has come up with an idea that will change her life. She wants to commit suicide and she wants Sophia there to hold her hand.Guests: Geraldine Fitzgerald..

programme.title: Christmas Made to Order
programme.desc: A Christmas amateur finds himself in charge of his family's holiday celebration. Desperate for help, he enlists an expert in all things Christmas and together, they discover what's truly important in life.

programme.title: Pride, Prejudice and Mistletoe
programme.desc: A career-driven woman finds her life turned upside down when she is forced to return to her hometown to care for her sick mother.

programme.title: Check Inn to Christmas
programme.desc: A town's Christmas celebration is used to reunite two families to save an inn.

programme.title: Crashing Through the Snow
programme.desc: A couple decide to crash their family’s perfect Christmas celebration.

programme.title: A Crown for Christmas
programme.desc: After getting fired from her job at a ritzy NYC hotel, a woman accepts a job as a governess to a young girl. She finds herself attracted to the girl’s father, who is king of the country, and love reigns over the kingdom.

programme.title: A Timeless Christmas
programme.desc: A man travels from 1903 to 2020, where he meets a woman giving tours of his home and experiences a 21st Century Christmas.

programme.title: Five Star Christmas
programme.desc: When a travel writer shows up unexpectedly at their dad's B&B, the Ralston family all pretend to be guests in hopes of a good review.

programme.title: You, Me, and the Christmas Trees
programme.desc: As Christmas nears, an arborist helps a farmer whose trees are beginning to die. They begin to fall in love while getting to the root of the problem.

programme.title: Christmas Next Door
programme.desc: The author of bachelor lifestyle books, is left in charge of his young niece and nephew for the holidays.

programme.title: Christmas Next Door
programme.desc: The author of bachelor lifestyle books, is left in charge of his young niece and nephew for the holidays.

programme.title: Let It Snow
programme.desc: When a resort executive is sent to a newly purchased lodge in Maine with instructions to turn it into an ultra-modern resort, she finds a charming, successful lodge loaded with holiday spirit and makes a connection with the owner's handsome son.

programme.title: Merry and Bright
programme.desc: Two people work together to make their candy-cane factory profitable, but in the end, it's their love that turns a profit.

programme.title: A Royal Christmas
programme.desc: A woman is whisked away to Europe when her boyfriend reveals he's actually a prince.

programme.title: On the Twelfth Day of Christmas
programme.desc: Maggie is thrilled when her long time crush, Mitch, moves to her little town. Once she discovers his love for Christmas has changed she vows to bring his holiday spirit back.

programme.title: Christmas Getaway
programme.desc: A recently single travel writer is forced to share a cabin due to a mix up on her holiday vacation. What is an annoyance at first quickly changes to a new romance.

programme.title: Snow Bride
programme.desc: A reporter pretends to be the girlfriend of the son of a famous politician to help him save face over Christmas. She becomes torn between exposing newsworthy scoops about the famous family and trusting that she's falling in love for real.

programme.title: Christmas in Rome
programme.desc: An American tour guide working in Rome agrees to give a tour to a businessman. The two quickly learn that when in Rome, love prevails.

programme.title: Good Morning Christmas!
programme.desc: Two squabbling TV hosts are sent to a festive small town over Christmas. While pretending to get along for the sake of appearance, they discover that there's more to each other than they thought.

programme.title: If I Only Had Christmas
programme.desc: At Christmas, a cheerful publicist teams up with a cynical VP and his eclectic team to help a charity in need.
